name: Starship Manager
description:
Command your own fleet of starships in this simple RTS game! Blow up the mothership of the enemy or defeat all their starfighters in order to win. Approach the terminals found floating in space and solve their problems in order to gain scrap to level up your starfighters!

Controls: 
- Hold down middle mouse and move your mouse in order to move the camera. Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
- Left Click + Drag or use the number keys to select units.
- Right click in Space to move all selected units there.
- Right click on an enemy ship to target them with the selected units.
- Move a unit over a terminal with stars around it to open it up! Then click on its buttons to solve the problems.
- After solving the problems, you gain 1 scrap! Click the upgrade button to make your starfighters more powerful.
- Pressing Escape opens the pause menu.

Discovered Bugs: (sorry!)
- Once 1 scrap is gained from a terminal, it will never give scrap again.
- Entering into fullscreen mode allows you to see past the left and right of the playable area with the camera.
- The enemy seems unable to control one of its starfighters.

Starfighter art created by Alison Weiser. Thank you!
Programming and all other art was done by Derek.

Music Used:
"Space" by Chad Crouch is licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0
"Meteorite" by Simon Mathewson is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
